i definitely have something to talk about, even though i was living and raised up in china after i was born in 1999, mjs music still came around my childhood, my memories about it was very blurry, i rarely heard about mjs music before i even knew what was it and who was it, but at least one thing for sure is that i was known about some of 'beat it's melodies when i was 10 year old, but at that time i didnt even know what should i do if i wanna find that song, but it sure was special to me, thats why i kept it in my memories.
im not sure what exactly the year it was but i guess its around 2010 that made me about 11 year old, i was watching videos about a multiplayer mod of a video game called 'vice city', the video creator added 'beat it' as the videos background music, and thats where i got all the information that i needed, the first time in my life that i was known about the songs name, and the legend himself 'michael jackson'.
